item.description:
The last two BPC Photoshop workshops I'm teaching have a few spaces available... we're also opening these up to Digital Arts members. $36 payment is due when you sign up. Spots will not be held until payment is received. Please email me if you have any questions.

The third workshop isn't necessarily for the advanced user, rather to give beginning users additional strategies for enhancing photographs. Topics will include making targeted adjustments using selection tools, multiple layers, and layer masks. HDR will be explained and strategies will be presented for combining multiple images from bracketed exposures.

- In Depth Look at the Layers Palette
- Nondestructive editing with Adjustment Layers
- Selections, and selective editing
- Working with layer masks
- Working with blending modes
- Stitching Panoramas
- Merging bracketed exposures to HDR
- Watermarking photographs

group.name: The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Photoshop 103 Workshop: Layers and Masks
